welcome_message_body: Welcome to Dumai, Indonesia! Known for its beautiful beaches, rich cultural heritage, and warm hospitality, we invite you to explore and enjoy all the charm this city has to offer. Have a wonderful time discovering Dumai!

restaurants.name: Sate Ayam Madura
restaurants.description: Sate Ayam Madura is a fast food restaurant located in Dumai.
restaurants.address: Jalan Sultan Syarif Kasim, Dumai, Riau

restaurants.name: Kebab Turki - Baba Rafi
restaurants.description: Kebab Turki - Baba Rafi is a burger joint located in Dumai.

restaurants.name: Ayam Penyet Pattimura
restaurants.description: Ayam Penyet Pattimura is a indonesian restaurant located in Kecamatan Dumai Barat.
restaurants.address: Jl. Pattimura, Kecamatan Dumai Barat, Riau

restaurants.name: Bakso Rahayu
restaurants.description: Bakso Rahayu is a indonesian meatball restaurant located in Dumai.
restaurants.address: Jl. Sultan Syarief Kasim, Dumai, Riau

restaurants.name: Rumah Makan Pak Datuk
restaurants.description: Rumah Makan Pak Datuk is a padangnese restaurant located in Dumai.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Pinang Kampai Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Pinang Kampai Airport, serving domestic flights only.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
